member.name: IWizardSite.GetCancelledPage
member.summary: Called when the user cancels navigation through the wizard extension. Gets the handle of the that represents the wizard page to display when the user cancels navigation while in the wizard extension.
member.param: A pointer to a handle variable of type that receives the wizard page to display when the user cancels navigation while in the wizard extension.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardSite.GetNextPage
member.summary: Called when the user navigates forward past the wizard extension pages. Gets the handle of the that represents the wizard page immediately following the wizard extension page.
member.param: A pointer to a handle variable of type for the wizard page following the extension page.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardSite.GetPreviousPage
member.summary: Called when the user navigates backward out of the wizard extension. Gets the handle of the that represents the wizard page that is before the wizard extension page.
member.param: A pointer to a variable handle of type that represents the wizard page that comes immediately before the wizard extension page.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardSite
member.summary: Exposes methods used by a wizard extension to navigate the borders between itself and the rest of the wizard.
